quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: What I can do is chase again, and if still no reply, I’ll escalate it up the chain.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: To the inspector level, above the sergeant, if needed.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Right, because otherwise I’m left hanging without answers.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, and I know that’s very difficult. I’ll do my best to press them this week.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It’s not just difficult, it’s unsafe for me.

contradictions.issue: Advocate acknowledges delays unsafe but offers only generic escalation promises

timeline_hooks.ref: victim left unsafe due to delays
